shared.model.turn

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.turn.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    All action methods associated with dice rolls.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignResources(int diceResult)
      Assigns resources to players based on dice result.
      void moveRobber()
      Allows player to move robber to any hex of their choosing.
      void rollDice()
      Rolls the game dice.
      void stealResource()
      Allows player to steal a resource from another player who has settlement adjacent to location of robber.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
        Rolls the game dice.

      • assignResources

        public void assignResources(int diceResult)
        Assigns resources to players based on dice result. Robber's location is skipped.

      • moveRobber

        public void moveRobber()
        Allows player to move robber to any hex of their choosing.

      • stealResource

        public void stealResource()
        Allows player to steal a resource from another player who has settlement adjacent to location of robber. If no adjacent players have resources or are there are adjacent players, nothing happens.
